body: Crosslink protein/DNA by adding 37% \(54 µl) formaldehyde to 2ml of media
Shake gently to mix and then incubate at room temperature for 10 min.
Add 10X Glycine solution \(200 µl) to quench unreacted formaldehyde
Mix gently and incubate at room temperature for 5 min.
Remove medium and wash with cold PBS \(2X)
Add 0.1ml PBS containing protease inhibitor cocktail
Collect cells, centrifuge at 700xg for 3 min at 4 <sup>o</sup>C and discard supernatant
Resuspend cell pellet in 200μl lysis buffer containing protease inhibitor cocktail.
Sonicate cell lysate on ice for 4 second 3 times
Centrifuge at 14,000 rpm at 4 <sup>0</sup>C for 10 min and transfer supernatant \(~100 μl) to fresh tube
Add 900 μl of dilution buffer containing protease inhibitor cocktail
Add 60 μl of protein G agarose and incubate for 1 hr at 4 0C with rotation
Centrifuge at 3000g for 1 min and collect supernatant into fresh tube
Add 4μg of anti STAT1 antibody and incubate overnight at 4 0C with rotation
Add 60 μl of protein G agarose for 1 hr at 4 <sup>0</sup>C with rotation
Centrifuge at 3000X g for 1 min and remove supernatant
Wash pellet with low salt wash buffer, high salt wash buffer, LiCl immune complex wash buffer and finally TE buffer
Add 100 μl of elution buffer and mix gently
Incubate at room temperature for 15 min
Centrifuge at 3000 x g for 1 min and collect supernatant into new tube
Repeat step 19 to 21 and combine supernatant
Add 8ul 5M NaCl and incubate at 65 <sup>o</sup>C for 5 hrs
Add 1ul of RNase A and incubate for 30 min at 37 <sup>o</sup>C
Add 4ul 0.5M EDTA, 8ul 1M Tris-HCl and 1ul Proteinase K and incubate at 45oC for 2 hrs
Add 1ml of bind reagent A to each tube and mix well
Transfer 600 μl of mixture to spin filter in collection tube and centrifuge at 14,000 g for 30 second
Discard liquid in collection tube and put the spin filter back into same collection tube
Transfer the remaining 600 μl of mixture to spin filter and centrifuge at 14,000 g for 30 second
Remove the liquid in collection tube and add 500 μl of wash reagent B to the spin filter in collection tube
Put the spin filter into new collection tube and add 50 μl of elution buffer to the spin filter
Centrifuge at 14,000 x g for 30 second and save eluate for PCR
